description:
One of our newer guys, Tim, sure likes going out hunting for guys that want to do scenes with him. We like motivated people like that.

Well for this week, Tim brought us Mark, a 23 year old electrician who happened to overhear Tim mention he was looking for guys for videos in the supermarket. Mark approached Tim and asked for details.Well, now you can see the details for yourself, as Tim and Mark, the newest buddies, come upstairs for a little porn watching...and something that Mark has NEVER experienced before...and blowjob from a guy.

Enjoy as these two young guys stroke, suck and blow cum...all for fun (and a little money).
title: Mark & Tim
